      • simulateBN

        protected gnu.trove.map.TIntIntMap simulateBN​(GraphicalModel<BayesianFactor> model,
                                              gnu.trove.map.TIntIntMap evidence)
        Algorithm 44 from "Modeling and Reasoning with BN", Dawiche, p.380
        Returns:
        a map with the computed sampled states over all the variables.

      • sample

        protected int sample​(BayesianFactor factor)
        Sample the distribution of a BayesianFactor with not parent nodes. Note that this factor distribution is over a single variable!
        Parameters:
        factor - factor to sample
        Returns:
        the index of sampled state

      • sample

        protected int sample​(BayesianFactor factor,
                     gnu.trove.map.TIntIntMap obs)
        Sample the distribution of a BayesianFactor with a specific set of parent observations.
        Parameters:
        factor - factor to sample
        obs - map of the states of the parent nodes
        Returns:
        the index of sampled state
